trigger.title: Trigger: Default Block Use
trigger.description: Triggers when the player activates a block's default use action (opening a door, pushing a button, opening a crafting grid, etc).

conditions.title: Conditions
conditions.description: Object containing conditions that need to be met when the trigger gets activated. The criterion is marked completed when the trigger activates and all conditions passed.

location.title: Location
location.description: Specifies a list of predicates that must pass in order for the criterion to be granted. The origin is the location of the block that was interacted with and the block state belongs to that block. Note that for this trigger, a 'tool' is not provided. The 'this' entity is the player that would get the advancement.
